text: Nikolai Alexandrovich Bulganin (; 30 March 1895 – 24 February 1975) was a famous Soviet politician. He served as Minister of Defence (1953–55) and Premier of the Soviet Union (1955–58). He worked for Vladimir Lenin from 1917-1924 in the RSFSR,and the Soviet Union and later worked for Joseph Stalin from 1924-1953 and later Georgy Malenkov in 1953 and later Nikita Khrushchev from 1953-1960. He died in 1975 when the Soviet Union was led by Leonid Brezhnev from 1964-1982. ==Other websites== Category:1895 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Heads of government of the Soviet Union Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:Marshals of the Soviet Union Category:Politicians from Nizhny Novgorod
title: Nikolai Bulganin
